text: Jack Gilford (July 25, 1908 â€“ June 4, 1990) was an American movie, television, stage actor, and comedian. He was known for his roles in Cocoon, A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum Movie, Caveman, They Might Be Giants, and in Catch-22. Gilford was born on July 25, 1908 in New York City, New York.Jack Gilford Biography (1907-1990) He was married to Madeline Lee from 1949 until his death in 1990. Gilford died on June 4, 1990 in New York City, New York from stomach cancer, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1908 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Jack Gilford
